<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/trace/{workflowId}/progress"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Store the execution metadata for one or more tasks in the given `workflowId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workflowId","in":"path","description":"Workflow string identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"workspaceId","in":"query","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
